---
id: bulk-follow-tickets
title: "Bulk follow tickets"
description: "Adds the authenticated user as a follower to multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Followers receive email notifications about ticket updates, comments, and status changes, enabling proactive monitoring of tickets without being assigned."
sidebar_label: "Bulk follow tickets"
hide_title: true

info_path: docs/api/tickets/tickets-api

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk follow tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/follow"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds the authenticated user as a follower to multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Followers receive email notifications about ticket updates, comments, and status changes, enabling proactive monitoring of tickets without being assigned.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets of interest and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with criteria (e.g., high priority, specific issue type) → collect `TicketId` array
2. Bulk follow: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/follow](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-follow-tickets) with ticket IDs
3. Receive updates: System sends notifications when followed tickets are modified

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketIds` array.

**Use Cases**: Supervisors monitoring team workload, stakeholders tracking project-related tickets, subject matter experts staying informed on specific issue categories.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/unfollow](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-unfollow-tickets) – Stop following multiple tickets
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-user) – Add follower to single ticket
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/team/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-team) – Add team as followers

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

ticket search payload consumed by [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/slas](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-slas). Useful for audit or recovery workflows.","example":false},"ShowTicketsForAllSites":{"type":"boolean","description":"Allows global administrators to query tickets across every site in the tenant instead of the caller's active site context.","example":false}},"example":{"ProductId":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00020","Schema":"OpenWithModify","Filters":[{"Facet":"status","Id":"984d5e42-7df5-e511-a789-005056bb000e","Name":"Assigned","Selected":true,"GroupIndex":0},{"Facet":"agent","Id":"c64a05b1-6a2d-ea11-a601-0003ffe41fe2","Name":"iiQ Admin","Selected":true,"GroupIndex":0}],"FilterByProduct":true,"IncludeDeleted":false,"ShowTicketsForAllSites":false}}],"title":"GetTicketsRequest"}],"type":"object"},"Flags":{"type":"integer","description":"Bulk operation flags. 0=None, 1=ShareEffort.","enum":[0,1],"default":0}},"example":{"TicketIds":["260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","370c9884-edbe-f011-9f72-111e4a8cc629"],"Request":{"UserId":"1eb32e06-b79f-f011-b484-002248538047"}},"title":"BulkFollowTicketsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
